Class MainMenuInitializer

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.controller.mainMenu.MainMenuInitializer
public class MainMenuInitializer extends Object
Helper to initialize the main menu UI. The long initialization logic was extracted from `MainMenuController.initialize()` to keep the controller file smaller. The controller should call the static `initialize(...)` method and apply returned helpers/state as needed.

      Initialize the main menu view and behaviour.

      The method centralizes loading resources, wiring button behaviour, creating helpers (overlay, media, effects) and registering audio listeners. It returns a MainMenuInitializer.Result object containing helpers and metadata the caller should retain and apply to the controller.

      Returns:
      a MainMenuInitializer.Result instance with prepared helpers and menu state
